analysis.description:

Utils.strlen (/unique_chucks/27/0x54e529f3673eb585c1690880186eac3c4dd30b09.sol#30-68) is declared view but contains assembly code

Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/27/0x54e529f3673eb585c1690880186eac3c4dd30b09.sol:
	Contract SomeCoin has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/27/0x54e529f3673eb585c1690880186eac3c4dd30b09.sol)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Utils.strlen uses assembly (/unique_chucks/27/0x54e529f3673eb585c1690880186eac3c4dd30b09.sol#30-68)
